name: They want the kids
description:
Prototyping some ideas for top down shooter and decided to put some stuff into it.

Controls
WASD moves

esc pauses

mouse click shoots, use pointer to aim.

monsters spawn at certain points over time

Goals: 

  • stay alive 
  • keep the children safe
  • destroy all monsters
  • have fun

Influenced a bit by lurking on the Loor founders group. I want them to succeed because there needs to be better Christian media also most entertainment folks and businesses are creeps that prey on women and children. If you're a Christian then maybe it's worth following them to see what's going on with them. Their animated stuff looks interesting.

Anyways don't take this too seriously Everything made by me using Godot, Aseprite, Gimp, BFxr, musecore3, Audacity. Pallete is nanner jam 32 font is vt323. 

Might use some of the basic setup for a future project that's more thought out, but hey I made a bunch of templates for other projects so that's a win.
